comments.body: Quote from: piebeyb on March 18, 2023, 07:57:24 AMA strong community/reputation and the age of the second site are actually the most important of the others, but that doesn't mean the others aren't important, but I'm more focused on the two above, sometimes to find a casino you should look for a casino that has been operating for a long time and see their reputation. because it will give us a sense of security to put money there to gamble. Reputation is the main benchmark for an online casino so that users can trust it. If the reputation is good, then there will be many users who come and register. and the age of online casinos depends on how the reputation is owned, even though the site is quite old but does not guarantee a good reputation, depending on how the casino developer provides good service for users.Everyone has their own judgment and some very important ones in my opinion are the good help response from the casino when there are problems, as well as the ease of making deposits and withdrawals. For KYC, it may be possible to follow the rules that have been recommended and also need to add an assessment of AML (Anti Money Laundering) because it is also important for the security of the site as well. If the online casino site is used for crimes such as money laundering then it is likely that the site will be flagged and will be forcibly closed, then it has an impact on users as well.
